Sakari PesonenPortfolio

M.Sc. student from Aalto University majoring in intelligent products and minoring in embedded systems. Experience from DevOps and software development and constantly looking for ways to improve knowledge and skills, both technical and non-technical. Together with IT background I also have experience from teaching and customer service and I know how to find the best features from the people I work with.


Questions? Send me a message on LinkedIn or via . Most of public projects in this portfolio can be also found on my Github.

Work Projects

Major Healthcare organisation - Test Data Visualization

Technologies: Grafana, InfluxDB, Rational DOORS, Robot Framework

Date: 11/2015­-01/2016

Role: DevOps Consultant

Data visualization tool for tracking level of automation in testing of patient monitors. Data obtained from Robot Framework tests and software requirements.

Company providing CAD software - Audit + Proof Of Consept

Payment terminal company - Test Automation for Payment Terminals

Technologies: Robot Framework, Python, Raspberry Pi, Tesseract OCR, ShapeOko 2, Arduino, Deveo, 3D­-printing.

Date: 02/2015–06/2015

Role: DevOps Consultant

My goal was to automate whole testing environment for payment terminals at the final product level, i.e. pushing buttons and reading screen using computer vision. Setup composed of portal robot, raspberry pi with camera module, and several 3D­-printed parts.

Video from Eficode vimeo channel

Vaisala Ltd - Test Automation environment

Technologies: ​Robot Framework, Sikuli, Selenium, Jenkins

Date: 06/2014–09/2014

Role: Giant Leap Intern, working as a one man project team

Implementation of a test automation environment for web­-based UI testing. Solution integrated both Selenium and Sikuli to the same test environment.

University Projects

Collection and visualization of road conditions

Technologies: Arduino, MEAN stack

Date: 9/2015–12/2015

Embedded sensors for collecting data about road surface conditions in cars. Web application for visualizing the data on top a map view.

University/Hobby project - CNC milling machine

Technologies: PlanetCNC, Fusion 360, Stepper motors

Date: 9/2015–12/2015

CNC machine built from scratch. 3­-axis, 1.5x1.2x1m steel/aluminium frame. Stepper motors on each axis and water cooled spindle. Will be used for milling MDF and small aluminium parts. Made especially for making molds for competition grade radio controlled model airplanes.

Drone for collecting node data

Technologies: Arduino, Parrot Drone, Node.js

Date: 01/2015–05/2015

Worked as a project leader in project where we developed a drone for data collection.

Autonomous Drone

Technologies: ROS, Raspberry PI, Arduino, Ardupilot, LiDAR

Date: 09/2014–12/2014

Autonomous flying robot built from scratch. ROS running on Raspberry PI and localisation and navigation done by using LiDAR on top of the drone

Micro Machines C++ game

Technologies: Open GL, Make

Date: 09/2012–12/2012

Micro Machines car game done by 3 person group. Work was divided to different tasks and my responsibilities related to the car physics.

Mobile app developed using cross platform framework. Location information of users is stored to AWS and information about other users nearby are shown in the app.
